title: Exciting New Year’s Shrine Visit
detail_text: <:th_ch0201/>Dia-san’s birthday party yesterday was so fun. The µ’s traditional Japanese dance performance was super beautiful!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Thank you. We practiced a lot, so I’m happy to hear that. Your handmade green tea warabimochi jelly dessert was very delicious. I saw Dia-san eat a lot of them.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Really? Yay! 𝅘𝅥𝅮<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Oh, right. Did you take any pictures yesterday? If you did, could you send them to me? Arisa said she wanted to see pictures of the party, but I forgot to take any pictures of my own.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Of course! I’ll send them to you now!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Thanks, I appreciate it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Hey, do you want me to be in charge of taking pictures during the first shrine visit of the year later?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Sure! It’ll be great to have a picture of everyone wearing furisode kimono.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>I’m excited too! I’m going to go get ready!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Fufu, alright. I can’t wait to see you in furisode, Ayumu. 𝅘𝅥𝅮<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
